text:
Place the cream cheese, sugar and vanilla into a mixing bowl. Using the electric hand mixer, beat together until smooth. Add the mascarpone cheese. Beat in using medium speed, until just combined. Add the cream last. Beat in until the mixture is smooth. Spread the frosting over a cake as well as on the inner middle layer. If you are making cupcakes - frost the top of the cakes. Decorate with extra garnishes. While the frosting is enough on its own, you might like to add other toppings to the frosting, such as:
Chocolate sprinkles or grated/shredded chocolate
Chocolate curls
Shredded coconut or toasted coconut flakes
Dusted cocoa powder
Chopped or flaked nuts
Rock candy crystals, etc. Finished.
